divs: Sighting DetailsMy brother inlaw and i were sitting outside on my balcony when suddenly we both saw this ball of light appear out of nowhere and shoot downwards at a 15 degree angle the ground then suddenly changed and shot upwards for a second then vanished
trends: There have been 78 other sightings in Oklahoma City
